reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 20/03: PRESCRIBED PAYMENT PER BED - CLAUSE 6 (A) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRESCRIBED PAYMENT PER BED — CLAUSE 6 (a) OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 20/03: PRESCRIBED PAYMENT PER BED - CLAUSE 6 (A) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Charitable Institutions Act   Loi sur les établissements de bienfaisance

content.content: 1. The prescribed amount per bed for the purposes of clause 6 (a) of the Act is an amount not exceeding $50,000. O. Reg. 20/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The prescribed amount per bed for the purposes of clause 6 (a) of the Act is an amount not exceeding $50,000. O. Reg. 20/03, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 20/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 20/03, s. 2.
